title: you, riot, fail... give my old client back.
body:
Who agrees that Riot is failed to meet our expectation to not able to accept the new client?

 
Old client is much better to use... so why force us to get used to the uncompleted client? There is many important thing features such as item set, view the profile easily, etc

Do the right at first time... the new client SHOULD include all features and friendly to use as the old client.

replies.body:
It is faster, cleaner and looks a lot nicer, plus all the other reasons riot has given (way easier to update and modify, more stable..).

If it is giving you issues, look at the troubleshooting instead of shitposting.

Your computer must be very slow... old client is fast as new one... plus new client = more clicks. annoying due to missing features.... not really cleaner because both looks same... and less user-friendly.

Is the old client really unstable?! I never experienced any problems. 

Stop to spread some false facts.

My computer is not remotely slow, and i am not going from purely personal experience. The air client was notoriously broken and unstable.
Not to mention that some abstract measurement of speed really has nothing to do with the stability of software.

One person's experiences are never a good indication of software performance, but you have had good luck if you never experienced UI bugs, freezes, the client blocking you from entering games, network bugs, update issues, ect.
This client will be easier to integrate with TenCent's store front which is going global. Or that's my guess.
